籤詩版本二:
He paʻakikī loa ka hoʻomaopopo ʻana i ka nūhou mai ka lewa, mai manaʻo nui.
Ina oe e wili i ka pohaku i ke aniani, ina ua ike oe ua makehewa kou hooikaika ana.
詩意:
Mālama kēia hexagram i ke kiʻi o ka maluhia mau.
ʻO ka mālama ʻana iā ʻoe iho i nā mea āpau e lawe mai i ka pōmaikaʻi.
解曰: ʻO nā ʻano hoʻopunipuni a pau. Ua pau ka hooikaika ana. ʻOi aku ka maikaʻi o ka mālama ʻana. He aha ke kumu?
籤詩故事一:
◇ ʻO ke kaikamahine kāne e ʻimi ana i ke kāne
I ka wā o ka Qin Dynasty, ʻo Meng Jiangnu ka mōʻī mua o ka Qin Dynasty, i kāna pō male mare, ua hopu ʻia kāna kāne ʻo Fan Qiliang (Wan Xiliang) a hoʻouna ʻia e kūkulu i ka Pa Nui. Ua huakaʻi ʻo Meng Jiangnu i mau tausani mile no ka hoʻouna ʻana aku i kāna kāne i nā lole mehana, a ua lōʻihi ka manawa e hiki ai i ka Pa Nui, akā i ka hopena ua haʻi ʻia ʻo ia ua make kāna kāne a ua kanu ʻia kona kino ma lalo o ka Pa Nui. Uwe iho la o Meng Jiangnu i ka waimaka, a hiolo ka Pa Nui, a ua loaa aku ke kino o kana kane me ke koko e kulu ana ma ka puu iwi. No laila, kiʻi akula ʻo Qin Shihuang iā Meng Jiangnu, no ka mea, ua haʻalulu loa ʻo ia, makemake ʻo ia e lawe iā Meng Jiangnu i haiā wahine nāna. Ua noi ʻo Meng Jiangnu iā Qin Shihuang e hele i ka mokupuni ʻo Qinhuang e hoʻomaikaʻi iā Fan Qiliang, a ua ʻae ʻo Qin Shihuang, ma hope o ka hoʻomaikaʻi ʻana o Qin Shihuang iā ia. Ua paʻa ʻo Fan Qiliang, ʻo Meng Jiangnu i ke kino o kāna kāne ma ke kahua o ka luakini ʻo Meng Jiangnu i kēia lā.
聖意: ʻO ka palekana home, mālama pono iā ia iho, waiwai, kālepa kūpono, male, kū'ē, Liujia wahine hele wāwae, neʻe mahina, silkworms, pōʻino holoholona, ​​pilikia i ka loaʻa kanaka, hoopii, poho, migration, lilo waiwai, mai, lako, hoouna aku i Anshan lua kupapaʻu, Pōmaikaʻi iā ʻoe
古人: ʻO ke kaikamahine Ginger e ʻimi ana i ke kāne
